reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous, comfortable, and appreciate its great quality and good stretch. The fit is positive, with one customer noting it's "short gal friendly." Customers disagree on whether the dress is flattering and true to size, with some finding it too small. The style receives mixed reactions, with one customer mentioning it's perfect for a fall wedding. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, form fitting yet modest
items.body: Obsessed with this dress. I tried on multiple sizes and they all fit because it stretches so nicely. I have a pear shaped / hourglass figure and am short and felt gorgeous in this. I like to be modest yet feel sexy and this nailed it. Read more
items.author: Marisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute!
items.body: Loved the way this dress fit me. Wore it to a wedding recently. Felt confident! Material was stretchy and comfortable. Read more
items.author: Cierra o.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too small
items.body: This dress was too small Read more
items.author: Linda Chandler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable!
items.body: Great material, stretchy, soft, comfortable. Beautiful color. Love the sleeves. I did end up returning this dress as I chose a different style for my son's wedding, but I'd buy again if I had a place to wear it. Read more
items.author: J.Stolz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Short gal friendly!
items.body: I’m a short girl and this dress was perfect for our engagement photos! It has a good stretch, is soft and comfortable, and not see through. I’m 5’0” for reference and the length fit me good with the shape of the dress and didn’t drown me Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super short but pretty
items.body: Such a pretty dress but it is SO short. I’m 5’3 and it cut off just below my knee. Read more
items.author: Erin Crain

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, not the most flattering though
items.body: Did not love for my style, it was giving me funeral vibes and did not look great on me. I’m sure somebody else would look great but just wasn’t my favorite purchase sadly. Read more
items.author: Kaylee Veltri

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I’m 5’1 145 lbs got a S I’m very happy with how it fits. Stretched good. Hugs my curves nicely Read more
items.author: Cynthia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Mermaid Maxi Cocktail Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Red, Wine, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Black, Coffee, Dustyblue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
